name: gulp-concat-flatten
description: A Gulp plugin to recursively flatten directories and concatenate the files within
author: Joschi Kuphal <joschi@kuphal.net> (https://jkphl.is)

scripts.test: eslint --fix **/*.js && istanbul test ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report html -- test/*.js --reporter spec
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
